entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:30 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -20.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 4:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -20.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -23.0°C
Wind: E 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Blizzard developing after midnight. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 60%
